person:biography.personal-details:content: Mustafa Tabakci received doctor degree in Chemistry in Graduate School of Natural Sciences, Selçuk University in 2006. Now he is a Professor in Department of Chemical Engineering, Konya Technical University. His current interests are synthesis of calixarenes, supramolecular chemistry, sensors and adsorption.

keyword:keyword.keyword:content: calixarene, supramolecules, adsorption, polymer, synthesis, sensor
